item.title: [317] Adding Wilderness Areas, delta
item.dc:creator: @Demise Demise
item.description:
@Demise wrote:

[code] public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
if (Type == 1) {
return (((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) || (coordX >= 3220 && coordX <= 3299 && coordY >= 3520 && coordY <=3548) || (coordX >= 2250 && coordX <= 2296 && coordY >= 4676 && coordY <=4715))

	} else if (Type == 2) {
		if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
				&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
			return true;
		}
	} else if (Type == 2) {
		if ((coordY >= 9627) && (coordY <= 9641) && (coordX <= 2995)
				&& (coordX >= 2978))
	}
	return false;[/code]

I get 100 errors here, any help?

Read full topic
